thread.title: My film with Simhaa is a travel story: Sshivada
thread.title_full: My film with Simhaa is a travel story: Sshivada - The Times of India

author: Logesh Balachandran
title: My film with Simhaa is a travel story: Sshivada
text:
Looks like Sshivada Nair, who was lauded for her performance in Nedunchalai, is on a signing spree. Sshivada will be playing the lead in Bobby Simhaa's upcoming film.
"I will start shooting for Simhaa's film by the end of this month, which will be directed by debutant Vijay. The film is tentatively titled as Vallavanukkum Vallavan and my role is interesting. It's a travel story along with some comedy elements," says Sshivada, adding, "I am also awaiting for the release of my film Zero, which has Ashwin Kakumanu in the lead. It's a supernatural thriller, and I played the role of a modern housewife in the film."
Sshivada is also set for her comeback in Malayalam. "I am paired opposite Jayasurya in a Malayalam film. I play a girl from Bangalore, who is a therapist. I am also waiting to shoot for a film in Kannada."
